name: Tower (itch) (Undalord)
description:
How long can you defend your towers? Lose all of them, and it's game over! The slimes are relentless...

--------------

CONTROLS

--------------

PAN CAMERA : A & D Keys.
HIT ENEMIES : Left Click.  

MOVE PURCHASED TOWER : Arrow Keys.

Made for Juice Jam II.

-----------
CREDITS

-----------

Font Used: FFF-Forward.

Background music not made during jam.
